Summary: Black triangle had red light at each corner.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving for work in the morning about 4:45 a.m. and was looking up at the stars before I got in my vehicle (it was very clear sky's). That's when i noticed a red light moving in the sky at very high altitude. At first I thought it was a satellite that's when I noticed two other red lights and it was a black (or some other dark color) triangle. I know that sounds weired but it was a black triangle and had red lights at each corner. The reason I know it was a triangle instead of three individual lights was as it moved across the sky the object blocked the lights of the stars behind it. Focusing on the object harder you could see the body of the object as well. The object was at high altitude and was heading due east at very high speed. From the time I first saw the object until I couldn't see it anymore was about 15 to 20 seconds. No plane is going to shoot across the sky at that altitude in 15 seconds. This has been definitely one of the coolest things I have ever seen. I don't know if it was military in nature or something else, but I would love to find out.
